alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 19 at 12:15PM MST until November 19 at 1:30PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL KANE AND EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1215 PM MST, Earlier this morning, Zion National Park Rangers reported all drainages within the main canyon continued to have moderate flows. Additional heavy rain has fallen since this report and all drainages will continue to run high through at least 130 PM. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of rivers, creeks, normally dry washes, and slot canyons. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Zion National Park, Virgin, Springdale and Rockville. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
